name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__ACCOUNTS
description: Retrieve all Google Analytics accounts available to the authenticated user for account management

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__PROPERTIES
description: Retrieve all Google Analytics properties for website and app tracking configuration

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_PROPERTY
description: Create a new Google Analytics property for tracking website or mobile app analytics data

parent.description: Account to create property under (format: accounts/123456789)

currencyCode.description: Currency for monetary values (ISO 4217 code, e.g., 'USD')

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__UPDATE_PROPERTY
description: Update an existing Google Analytics property configuration and settings

displayName.description: Updated display name for the property

currencyCode.description: Updated currency code for monetary values

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__DATA_STREAMS
description: Retrieve data streams for tracking website, iOS app, or Android app analytics data collection

pageSize.description: Number of data streams to return

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_DATA_STREAM
description: Create a new data stream for website, iOS app, or Android app analytics tracking

parent.description: Property to create stream under (format: properties/123456789)

type.description: Type of data stream to create

displayName.description: Human-readable name for the data stream

measurementId.description: Analytics measurement ID for web tracking

firebaseAppId.description: Firebase app ID for Android app
Firebase app ID for iOS app

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CUSTOM_DIMENSIONS
description: Retrieve custom dimensions for enhanced analytics tracking and segmentation capabilities

pageSize.description: Number of custom dimensions to return

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_CUSTOM_DIMENSION
description: Create custom dimensions for enhanced user behavior tracking and data analysis segmentation

parent.description: Property to create dimension under (format: properties/123456789)

parameterName.description: Parameter name for the custom dimension (alphanumeric and underscores only)

displayName.description: Display name shown in Google Analytics UI

description.description: Description of what this dimension tracks

scope.description: Scope of the custom dimension (EVENT, USER, or ITEM)

disallowAdsPersonalization.description: Prevent dimension from being used for ads personalization

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CUSTOM_METRICS
description: Retrieve custom metrics for tracking specific business KPIs and performance indicators

pageSize.description: Number of custom metrics to return

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_CUSTOM_METRIC
description: Create custom metrics for tracking business-specific KPIs and performance measurements

parent.description: Property to create metric under (format: properties/123456789)

parameterName.description: Parameter name for the custom metric (alphanumeric and underscores only)

displayName.description: Display name shown in Google Analytics UI

description.description: Description of what this metric measures

measurementUnit.description: Unit of measurement for the metric

scope.description: Scope of the custom metric (currently only EVENT supported)

restrictedMetricType.description: Restrictions on metric usage for ads personalization

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CONVERSION_EVENTS
description: Retrieve conversion events configuration for tracking important user actions and business goals

pageSize.description: Number of conversion events to return

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_CONVERSION_EVENT
description: Create conversion events to track important user actions like purchases, signups, and key business goals

parent.description: Property to create conversion under (format: properties/123456789)

eventName.description: Name of the event to mark as a conversion

createTime.description: Time when conversion event was created

deletable.description: Whether this conversion event can be deleted

custom.description: Whether this is a custom conversion event

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__AUDIENCES
description: Retrieve audience segments for targeted analytics and marketing campaign optimization

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_AUDIENCE
description: Create audience segments for targeted marketing and user behavior analysis campaigns

parent.description: Property to create audience under (format: properties/123456789)

displayName.description: Display name for the audience segment

membershipDurationDays.description: Number of days users remain in audience

filterClauses.description: Filter clauses to define audience membership

eventName.description: Event name to trigger audience membership

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__GOOGLE_ADS_LINKS
description: Retrieve Google Ads links for integrating analytics data with advertising campaigns and attribution

pageSize.description: Number of Google Ads links to return

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_GOOGLE_ADS_LINK
description: Create Google Ads links to integrate analytics data with advertising campaigns for attribution tracking

parent.description: Property to create link under (format: properties/123456789)

customerId.description: Google Ads customer ID to link

canManageClients.description: Enable management of Google Ads client accounts

adsPersonalizationEnabled.description: Enable ads personalization using Analytics data

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__USER_LINKS
description: Retrieve user access and permissions for Google Analytics property management and collaboration

parent.description: Account or property name (format: accounts/123 or properties/456)

pageSize.description: Number of user links to return

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_USER_LINK
description: Grant user access and permissions to Google Analytics accounts or properties for team collaboration

parent.description: Account or property to grant access to (format: accounts/123 or properties/456)

notifyNewUser.description: Send email notification to new user

emailAddress.description: Email address of user to grant access

directRoles.description: Direct roles to assign to the user

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__FIREBASE_LINKS
description: Retrieve Firebase project links for mobile app analytics integration and cross-platform tracking

pageSize.description: Number of Firebase links to return

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__MEASUREMENT_PROTOCOL_SECRETS
description: Retrieve Measurement Protocol secrets for server-side analytics tracking and data collection

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__CREATE_MEASUREMENT_PROTOCOL_SECRET
description: Create Measurement Protocol secrets for secure server-side analytics data transmission and validation

parent.description: Data stream to create secret under (format: properties/123/dataStreams/456)

displayName.description: Display name for the measurement protocol secret

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__ARCHIVE_CUSTOM_DIMENSION
description: Archive custom dimensions to stop data collection while preserving historical analytics data

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__ARCHIVE_CUSTOM_METRIC
description: Archive custom metrics to stop data collection while preserving historical performance data

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__DATA_RETENTION_SETTINGS
description: Retrieve data retention settings for managing analytics data storage duration and privacy compliance

name.description: Property data retention settings name (format: properties/123/dataRetentionSettings)

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__UPDATE_DATA_RETENTION_SETTINGS
description: Update data retention settings for analytics data storage duration and GDPR privacy compliance

resetUserDataOnNewActivity.description: Reset user data retention period on new activity

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__ENHANCED_MEASUREMENT_SETTINGS
description: Retrieve enhanced measurement settings for automatic event tracking of scrolls, downloads, and video engagement

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__UPDATE_ENHANCED_MEASUREMENT_SETTINGS
description: Configure enhanced measurement settings for automatic tracking of user interactions and engagement events

streamEnabled.description: Enable enhanced measurement for this stream

pageChangesEnabled.description: Track page changes in single-page applications

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__ATTRIBUTION_SETTINGS
description: Retrieve attribution model settings for understanding customer journey and conversion paths

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__UPDATE_ATTRIBUTION_SETTINGS
description: Configure attribution model settings for tracking customer journey and conversion attribution analysis

acquisitionConversionEventLookbackWindow.description: Lookback window for acquisition conversion events

otherConversionEventLookbackWindow.description: Lookback window for other conversion events

adsWebConversionDataExportScope.description: Scope for ads web conversion data export

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__SEARCH_ADS_360_LINKS
description: Retrieve Search Ads 360 links for integrating search advertising data with analytics attribution

pageToken.description: Token for pagination to next page

name: GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ADMIN__PROVISION_ACCOUNT_TICKET
description: Provision account tickets for creating new Google Analytics accounts with proper setup and configuration

countryCode.description: Country code for the account (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)
